name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到URL的表单，则非常有用

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

default-value.desc: The default value to show when the model doesn't have one
default-value.desc_cn: 模型没有时显示的默认值

default-view.desc: The default view of the picker

format-model.desc: Forces a certain model format upon the model
format-model.desc_cn: 在模型上强制使用特定的模型格式

palette.desc: Use a custom palette of colors for the palette tab
palette.desc_cn: 使用调色板选项卡的自定义调色板

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

flat.desc_cn: 应用“平面”设计（无默认阴影）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

no-header-tabs.desc: Do not render header tabs (only the input)

no-footer.desc: Do not render footer; Useful when you want a specific view ('default-view' prop) and don't want the user to be able to switch it
no-footer.desc_cn: 不呈现页脚；当您需要特定视图（“default-view”属性）并且不希望用户能够切换它时非常有用

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

change.desc: Emitted on lazy model value change (after user finishes selecting a color)
change.desc_cn: 当延迟的模型值更改时发出（用户选择完颜色后）
